A PRECIOUS MINE一个充满珍稀资源的矿井

Designed by Kaseycool5由 Kaseycool5 设计
Our latest featured image by Kaseycool5[tr] digs deep into every miner’s heart by creating this masterful multi-layered mine. Designed to reach down to the last drop of ore, the strategic railing keeps everyone safe while navigating this functional space. Thanks for inspiring us!我们最新放出的这张图片是由Kaseycool5建造的精美的多层矿井，它可是深入每一位矿工的内心。这些栏杆一直延伸到最底层的最后一块矿石，在为每个人导航的同时保证他们的安全。感谢您对我们的支持！
We always enjoy seeing what our community builds and we encourage YOU to send your coolest structures to FeatureMe@minecraft.net. So start crafting and hopefully, you’ll see your builds in an upcoming article!在看到社区里有新建筑时我们总是很欣喜，同时我们也鼓励您将您最棒的建筑作品发送到FeatureMe@Minecraft.net所以开始建造你的项目吧，希望能在下一篇文章中看到您精美的建筑！

原文作者：Nova Barlow发布时间：2020/4/16原文地址：https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/a-precious-mine翻译作者：Srar
